JOB DESCRIPTION: Job Description    Obtain job specifications / instructions from the reporting authority.   Work on product development modules, as instructed by the reporting authority.   Customize the software as per client requirements and instructions of the reporting authority.   Perform software testing at the end of each module as per the agreed technical specifications and solve various problems and bugs.   Accompany the Scanning team to project sites and perform quality checks and ensure that the software is in a state of readiness for performing the scanning/ Result processing operations.   Assist the scanning team in the performance of scanning operations and attend to all software related problems with respect to scanning operations.   Take a backup of the source and remove the same from the client s system.   Handover the Software copy of the programs along with the technical specifications, to the reporting authority.     Qualifications    Qualification: Any Graduate.   Experience: 1+Yr   Skill set: ASP.Net, VB.Net, MS SQL Server, Crystal report.      Additional Information    Good in web application development with ASP.Net with VB.Net preferred.
